verses.content: Leilung hi LALPA ta a na, a sûnga um po pohai leh, Khawvêl le a sûnga chênghai le hin.
Tuisuoriet chungahai amain ân dinsuo a ni sih a, Tuilienhai chunga khawm a sukdet bawk a.
LALPA tlângah tu am hang lâwn a ta? A hmun inthiengah tu am ngîr a ta?
Kut fai le lungril inthieng neia, A lungril teplo mei mei tienga sie ngailo: Hlêm tuma inkhâm ngailo mi chu.
Ama chun LALPA kuoma inthawkin malsâwmna hmûng a ta, A sandamtu Pathien kuoma inthawkin felna dawng bawk a tih.
Chu chu ama zawngtuhai suon a nih, Aw Jakob Pathien, i hmêl zawngtuhai chu.
Aw kul kawtkhârhai, in lu chung kha dawm sâng unla, Nangni kawtkhâr hlunhai, inkhai sâng ro: Chuongchun, ropuina LALPA hi a hung lût ding a nih.
Ropuina Lal chu tu am a na? LALPA hrâttak le thilthawtheitak, LALPA indonaa thilthawtheitak chu a nih.
Aw kul kawtkhârhai, in lu chunghai kha dawm sâng ro, Anih, kawtkhâr hlunhai, dawm sâng unla, Chuongchun, Ropuina Lal hi a hung lût ding a nih.
Chu Ropuina Lal chu tu am a na? Sipaihai LALPA chu, Ama ngei hi Ropuina Lal chu a nih.
